t: Amazon.com: Bondo Body Repair Kit, 00312, Filler 1.57 lb and Hardener 0.75 oz (1 Kit) : Automotive
s: Well, maybe not brand new, but pretty darn close. But the real highlight of this kit was the hardener. I don't know what kind of magic is in that little tube, but it made the filler so strong and durable. I swear, I could have hit my car with a hammer and it would have been fine. Okay, maybe not a hammer, but you get the idea. Overall, I would highly recommend the Bondo ...
